participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and creative, Alex enjoys immersing herself in fictional worlds and often expresses herself through her colorful hair.
participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and humorous, Jordan loves engaging with people and has a playful side, especially when it comes to his hobbies.
participant_2.background: i drive a ford pinto. i like donuts. i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️
